description: Weather conditions, time inquiries, and seasonal conversations

phrases.exampleSentence: Kokia šiandien temperatūra? Ar reikės striukės?
phrases.sentenceTranslation: What's the temperature today? Will I need a jacket?

phrases.exampleSentence: Atsiprašau, kiek dabar valandų? Mano laikrodis sustojo.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Excuse me, what time is it now? My watch stopped.

phrases.exampleSentence: Šiandien labai šalta. Reikės šilto palto.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: It's very cold today. I'll need a warm coat.

phrases.exampleSentence: Ar rytoj lis? Planuoju išvyką į gamtą.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Will it rain tomorrow? I'm planning a trip to nature.

phrases.exampleSentence: Kada prasidės pavasaris? Nekantriai laukiu šilto oro.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: When will spring begin? I'm eagerly waiting for warm weather.

phrases.exampleSentence: Šiandien gražus oras! Puiki diena pasivaikščiojimui.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: It's beautiful weather today! Perfect day for a walk.

phrases.exampleSentence: Kelintos valandos susitinkame rytoj? Ar 18:00 tinka?
phrases.sentenceTranslation: What time are we meeting tomorrow? Does 6 PM work?

phrases.exampleSentence: Šiemet labai karšta vasara. Reikia daugiau gerti vandens.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: This year is a very hot summer. Need to drink more water.

phrases.exampleSentence: Ar turite laiko pasikalbėti? Turiu svarbų klausimą.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Do you have time to talk? I have an important question.
